sentences.en: " The courier will depart next day , she's told . She sews a warrior's gown all night. "
sentences.cn: 明朝驿使发, 一夜絮征袍.

sentences.en: Before the flames of the fire - god, the impetuous warrior speedily retreated.
sentences.cn: 火神身上发出的烈焰烤得这位鲁莽的武士抱头逃窜.

sentences.en: He added that she is the relaxation of the warrior.
sentences.cn: 他又补充了一句,说战士也把她当作消遣品哪.

sentences.en: In her arms the warrior finds repose.
sentences.cn: 在她的怀抱里,这位武士得到了安宁.

sentences.en: Is the explanation satisfactory, dread warrior?
sentences.cn: 我这番解释你满意不满意, 令人可怕的战士?

sentences.en: It is true I am Shawnee. My forefathers were warriors. Their son is a warrior.
sentences.cn: 确实,我是萧尼族人, 我的祖先都是战士. 他们的子孙也是战士.

sentences.en: Jackson's triumph in 1828 changed the emphasis to warrior Presidents.
sentences.cn: 1828年杰克逊的当选把重点移到能征善战的总统.

sentences.en: The citizen served as warrior in youth, ruler in his maturity, priest in his old age.
sentences.cn: 这个市民年青时期当战士,壮年时期当统治者, 到了老年就当僧侣了.

sentences.en: The priestly caste does not normally intermarry with the warrior caste.
sentences.cn: 教士阶级通常不与武土阶级通婚.

sentences.en: The young man is a bold warrior.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻人是个很英勇的武士.

sentences.en: They know the Delavare to be of a high race, and a born warrior.
sentences.cn: 他们知道德拉威尔出身名门,是个了不起的战士.

sentences.en: This chaotic warrior was born in the hill - cradled town of Pao An, north Shaanxi.
sentences.cn: 这个乱世的豪杰生于陕西北部群山环抱的保安.

sentences.en: This chaotic warrior was born in the hill - cradled town of Pao An, north Shanxi.
sentences.cn: 这个乱世的豪杰生在陕西北部群山环抱的保安镇.

sentences.en: Tomatoa , of course , had developed into a classical island warrior.
sentences.cn: 塔曼托阿长成标准的岛上武士.

sentences.en: Warrior, hand of mine shall never molest your scalp.
sentences.cn: 战士, 我的手决不碰你的头皮.

words.tran_cn: 进行战争（war的现在分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 龙战士；龙之武士（功夫熊猫中的称号）；神龙大侠；龙勇士

trans.tran_en: a soldier or fighter who is brave and experienced – used about people in the past
